br.span: In an effort to help you organize all the information and resources from teachers and staff that has been shared, please save and review the linked site below. SST Discovery has created a site for Distance Learning with a goal to help parents and students find information quickly and not overwhelm you with the process of having to scroll up and down your Parent Square posts to remember links and assignments.

This site is and will continue to be a work in-progress as we continue to add more information as needed. Please take a look and save the site. I will also make sure to link it to the top of our homepage for easy access.

span.strong: IMPORTANT- Parents are now able to access digital folders with learning packets for the next two weeks. We will provide printed copies for anyone who cannot print at home each Monday. Please be sure to read the details and rules for packet pick up on the homepage of the Distance Learning Site. We will also have student meals available at Discovery every day from 11-1 pm. Details are also on the site.
